2017 October 07 c

About learning c struct

#include <stdio.h>
struct first{
	char name[10];
};
struct second{
	struct first a;
	int x;
};
struct third{
	struct second b;
	struct first c;
	char y[5];
};


int main(){
	struct third d = {.b = {.x = 233,.a = {"huaji"}},
	.c = {"huaihuai"},"2333"};
	struct third * p;
	p = &d;
	printf("%s\n",p -> b.a.name);
	printf("%d\n",p -> b.x);
	printf("%s\n",p -> y);
	printf("%s\n",d.b.a.name);

	struct second * z;
	z = &d.b;
	printf("%s\n",z -> a.name);
	printf("%d\n",z -> x);

	struct first * m;
	m = &d.b.a;
	printf("%s\n",m -> name);
	return 0;
}
